summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Pokemon Academy application including new Pokemon system, news detail pages, and admin functionality. All major features working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend API connectivity (22/22 tests passed - 100% success rate)
Profile dropdown with 'Visualizza Pokémon Posseduti' option
My Pokemon page navigation and display

Admin user list display (17 registered users found)
Pokemon search functionality in admin panel
Pokemon assignment to users by admin
Pokemon removal from users by admin
User Pokemon display with correct sprites and names
Pokemon detail page with stats and moves tabs
Navigation between Pokemon pages and dashboard
